alert.note: Alert for Northampton; Upper Bucks (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 19 at 7:55PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Hunterdon, northwestern Bucks and south central Northampton Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 754 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pleasant Valley, or 11 miles southeast of Allentown, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Quakertown, Hellertown, Tinicum, Ferndale, Frenchtown, Milford, Riegelsville, Pleasant Valley, Revere, Ottsville, Sergeantsville, Springtown, Erwinna and Richlandtown. This includes Interstate 78 in New Jersey near mile marker 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
